name: business
description: Economic development, green business practices, and sustainable commerce initiatives

proposals.text: Remove all environmental criteria from municipal procurement and explicitly prohibit consideration of sustainability in business licensing or permitting processes.
proposals.rationale: Actively prevents integration of climate considerations in business operations by removing existing frameworks and blocking new initiatives

proposals.text: Eliminate green business certification programs and redirect all sustainable business development funds to traditional economic growth initiatives.
proposals.rationale: Deliberately dismantles support systems for sustainable business practices while reinforcing traditional models

proposals.text: Require business improvement districts to exclude all climate-related projects from their development plans.
proposals.rationale: Systematically prevents community-level business climate initiatives

proposals.text: Mandate that business assistance programs prioritize rapid development over any environmental considerations.
proposals.rationale: Enforces business practices that ignore climate impacts

proposals.text: Cap sustainable business training programs at 5% of economic development budget regardless of demand.
proposals.rationale: Actively limits resources for business climate adaptation

proposals.text: Record business sector emissions data without implementing any reduction incentives or requirements.
proposals.rationale: Provides basic monitoring without encouraging improvement

proposals.text: Allow optional sustainability sections in business license applications without affecting approval decisions.
proposals.rationale: Permits but doesn't encourage business climate initiatives

proposals.text: Conduct annual business climate impact surveys with voluntary reporting mechanisms.
proposals.rationale: Creates awareness without requiring action

proposals.text: Provide basic green business guidelines in standard business welcome packets.
proposals.rationale: Offers fundamental information without meaningful support

proposals.text: Consider both environmental and traditional economic metrics in business development programs.
proposals.rationale: Balances climate and economic factors without preference

proposals.text: Maintain current mix of traditional and green business support services with equal funding.
proposals.rationale: Takes neutral approach to business sustainability

proposals.text: Create public recognition program for businesses achieving voluntary sustainability targets.
proposals.rationale: Encourages climate action through positive recognition

proposals.text: Offer 15% reduction in business license fees for companies meeting basic sustainability criteria.
proposals.rationale: Provides modest incentives for climate-friendly practices

proposals.text: Require all businesses over 50 employees to submit annual carbon footprint reports with reduction plans.
proposals.rationale: Sets mandatory but achievable climate accountability measures

proposals.text: Implement green business certification program with 20% tax incentives for certified companies.
proposals.rationale: Creates substantial benefits for verified climate action

proposals.text: Mandate all businesses with over $1M revenue to achieve 30% emissions reduction within 5 years.
proposals.rationale: Strong requirements with specific timeline

proposals.text: Create green business zones with 50% tax reduction for companies achieving zero-waste operations.
proposals.rationale: Major incentives for transformative business practices

proposals.text: Establish circular economy business district requiring 75% waste reduction and renewable energy use.
proposals.rationale: Comprehensive transformation of business operations

proposals.text: Require all businesses to achieve carbon neutrality through verified reductions and local offsets by 2028.
proposals.rationale: Transformative approach to business climate impact

proposals.text: Create climate-positive business certification requiring 110% carbon reduction through direct and community actions.
proposals.rationale: Near-complete transformation to regenerative business models

proposals.text: Mandate all businesses to implement comprehensive climate action plans achieving carbon negative operations through direct reductions and community benefits by 2026.
proposals.rationale: Complete transformation to climate-regenerative business sector
